member.name: T:Befunge.BefungeInterpreter
member.summary: Main Befunge class. Contains the Interpret method that can be used to interpret Befunge code

member.name: M:Befunge.BefungeInterpreter.Interpret(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Interprets the supplied befungeCode and returns the output as a string
member.returns: Returns the output of the supplied code
member.param: An optional TextWriter. It can be used to output to a file.
